author: Simon Difford
description: There are as many different recipes for this drink as there are varieties of apple and brands of apple liqueur: this one was popular in the UK during the Noughties.
name: Apple Martini (with apple schnapps)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
